All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    addAppointmentController
    This controller enables the user to add appointments to the database and is connected to the "addAppointment" view
    addCustomerController
    This controller enables the user to add customers to the database and is connected to the "addCustomer" view
    Appointment
    This is the appointment class that stores database info on an appointment
    AppointmentByLocation
    This class compiles a report listing appointments by location
    appointmentByLocationController
    REPORT CONTROLLER This controller generates the tableview for the appointment by location report
    AppointmentCRUD
    This class handles all database connections involving the appointment and appointment report classes
    checkForBlanks
    This class helps to check for blanks in text fields and combo boxes.
    ConnectionDB
    This class makes a database connection
    Contact
    This is the Contact class that stores database info on a contact
    ContactCRUD
    This class handles all database connections involving the contact class
    ContactSchedule
    This class is for an appointment schedule for a specific contact
    contactScheduleController
    This class creates a contact schedule for a specific contact selected from a combo box
    Country
    This class is for countries
    CountryCRUD
    This class handles all database connections involving the country class
    Customer
    This class is for customers
    CustomerCRUD
    This class handles all database connections involving the customer class
    FirstLevelDivision
    This class is for first level divisions
    FirstLevelDivisionCRUD
    This class handles all database connections involving the First Level Division class
    loginController
    This class takes a username and password, compares it to the database, and logs the user in, or warns of incorrect credentials.
    Main
    This class is the Main file that will start the program
    mainScreenController
    THIS CLASS CONTAINS BOTH LAMBDAS This class displays the main customer and appointment tables and acts as a hub.
    monthAndTypeReportController
    This class creates a report by month and type.It displays the info on a table that is automatically updated when an item on the combobox is selected.
    MonthTypeReport
    This class is for the Report by Month and Type
    Query
    This class establishes database connectivity
    TimeFunctions
    This class makes converting from utc to the local time zone of the user easier
    UpcomingAppointment
    This class is for appointments that are in 15 minutes
    updateAppointmentController
    This class enables the user to update an appointment.
    updateCustomerController
    This class enables a user to update a customer, the data is prepopulated from the user's customer selection on the mainscreen table
    User
    This class is for users
    UserCRUD
    This class handles all database connections involving the user class
    validateAppointment
    This class ensures appointments are not overlapping and are scheduled within business hours
